title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Pakistan 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly decreasing from 2019 to 2020, gradually increasing from 2020 to 2022, and finally roughly constant from 2022 to 2024.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2021 and 2022.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 5.02 was reached at Year 2023, and 2024
Minimum GDP growth compared to previous year about 2.35 was reached at Year 2020

max_summary: In general GDP growth compared to previous year has rose over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly decreasing from 2019 to 2020, gradually increasing from 2020 to 2022, and finally roughly constant from 2022 to 2024.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2021 and 2022.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 5.02 was reached at Year 2023, and 2024
Minimum GDP growth compared to previous year about 2.35 was reached at Year 2020
